profile.name: Yolanda
profile.title: Data Scientist with extensive experience in Data Analytics ( Python SQL R ) | Currently Advancing Skills as an Auditor Líder ISO 27001 with AENOR
profile.description:
Data Analyst with a strong background in database management and problem-solving, and Lead Auditor for ISO 27001 Information Security Management Systems (ISMS).

As a Biologist specialized in Biotechnology, Web Application Developer, holder of the IBM Data Science Professional Certificate, and certified in ISO 27001, I combine scientific knowledge with robust technical expertise.

manfredSpecificData.desiredJobDescription:
I am writing to express my keen interest in working in Data Analysis, Data Science ,QA Testing

I am thrilled about the opportunity to improve my knowledge and contribute to the Success of a Company.

I have a strong IT background, database management expertise, and a passion for data analysis, as I have worked as a Technician in the Distributed Technology Functional Group at Corte Ingles S.A. And nowadays, I am responsible for problem management, budgeting, and identifying database issues , also at El Corte Inglés S.A .

I am currently pursuing a Professional Certification Program in Data Science from IBM using Jupiyer Notebook and Watson Studio. And I have gained proficiency in Python, NoSQL, SAP CRM, Salesforce, IMS, JIRA, and MongoDB Atlas.
With a Bachelor's Degree in Biology (Biotechnology) ,VocacionaI Training Software Developer, with English C1 and German A2, I offer a unique interdisciplinary perspective that enhances my analytical thinking and attention to detail. 

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to contribute my skills and enthusiasm.
